title: Mystery Cookbook.rar
description: It&#039;s bon appetite as you take the role of a go-getting mouse who&#039;s out to become a skilled chef. To help him, you&#039;ll scour nearly a dozen locations for hundreds of hidden items and interact with an assortment of amusing characters as you search for the pages of a secret cookbook. Can you solve Gary the Goose&#039;s riddles? Will you help Scrunch the Hamster return to Mexico? And can you find all of the ingredients your master needs for the grand cook off? Packed with adventure and brimming with laughs, Mystery Cookbook is a delightful hidden object challenge for gamers with good taste!
